pullrequest.title: Add Insert tab to model editor

content.raw:
- Having thumbnails would be nice. We talked about grabbing the thumbnails from the PropShop so the first step would be to get the Propshop ready... I am currently just reusing the Insert tab that we have in the normal simulation mode. As for which tab to use as default - if I were to make something from the ground up then the Insert tab, but if I just wanted to edit an existing model then maybe the Settings tab.. So no strong preference here. 

- For advanced users they may want to know since their inspectors will be different. For first time users who want to just create something quickly, it may not matter.
content.html:
• Having thumbnails would be nice. We talked about grabbing the thumbnails from the PropShop so the first step would be to get the Propshop ready... I am currently just reusing the Insert tab that we have in the normal simulation mode. As for which tab to use as default - if I were to make something from the ground up then the Insert tab, but if I just wanted to edit an existing model then maybe the Settings tab.. So no strong preference here.

  • For advanced users they may want to know since their inspectors will be different. For first time users who want to just create something quickly, it may not matter.
